::Spears::

She smiled and hugged Prebon. "Yes, if that would please you."

She looked down for a moment. She had so little will left, but even 
that little bit had to try. "May I go see Striker one last time. 
And...I...I kind of want to gloat a little."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> OOC: Whatever Alloran. That will put our numbers under, though. 
Man, 
> I don't know why everyone who can't find a use for a char, wants 
them 
> killed. You just wait around and leave them alone until an 
> opportunity rises. Look at what Logo did with Goldeneye. She had 
been 
> sitting on the shelf for weeks, and suddenly Dollen appears and 
she's 
> right back into it with a great storyline. If she had killed 
> Goldeneye, none of it would've happened! Oh, and Robo, can I use 
K9's 
> scrap pieces? I have an idea for them.
> 
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon smiled as he kissed Spears.
> 
> "How about me go outside and throw a little victory party, just the 
> two of us?"
> 
> Meanwhile, Hammer laughed rejoicely(is that a word?) to himself. He 
> sent a message to Prebon.
> 
> "Sir, that Maxi won't be following us any more. He didn't even last 
a 
> proper fight."
> 
> He walked over to the rubble of what was left.
> 
> "Hey...with proper adjustments, this could just work for Bullet's 
> plan! I've got to get these back to base!"
> 
> (I won't continue till Robo gives the okay.)
